xml:
Micanol<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Subacute and chronic psoriasis

To the skin

  • Adult

    Apply once daily, for application to skin or scalp, to be applied for up to 30 minutes, apply 1% cream, if necessary 3% cream can be used under medical supervision.

 Directions for administration

At the end of contact time, use plenty of lukewarm (not hot) water to rinse off cream; soap may be used after the cream has been rinsed off; use shampoo before applying cream to scalp and if necessary after cream has been rinsed off.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
